title.rendered: Why Your Lash Look is Guaranteed to Be Unique

content.rendered:
If you’ve been thinking about getting lash extensions for any length of time, chances are you’ve had many questions run through your mind. Among those may be questions about exactly how lash extensions will transform your appearance. Will your new lashes make you look like everyone else? How noticeable will they be? And perhaps most important of all: are they even the right solution for my perfect lash needs? We have the answers you need, and those answers all point to one undeniable truth: your lash look is guaranteed to be unique.

Lash Extensions Can’t Make You Look Like “One of the Crowd”

First, let’s make this clear upfront: your new extensions won’t leave you looking like everyone else you know. Even if you and a friend selected the exact same lash extensions and the same application technique, you would still each come out of that experience looking strikingly different. Why is that? It’s simple.

We all have different facial features and our own unique look. Different bone structures. Different eye shape. Different brows. Different natural lashes. And so on. And while extensions can enhance your natural lashes, and make your eyes look bigger and brighter, they really have no ability to change any of the central characteristics that make you who you are. They can’t change your facial structure, skin tone, eye shape, or any of those other attributes that distinguish you from everyone around you. So no – you won’t ever look like anyone else in the crowd.

That is, unless you have a twin out there. But that’s a separate matter entirely.

But Will they Be Noticeable?

Ultimately, it’s really up to you and your lash artist to decide how noticeable your extensions will be. Are you looking for something dramatically different? If so, tell your lash artist and watch it become reality. If not, discuss your preferences and opt for something a little more understated. As we noted, it really comes down to what you want and how well you communicate those desires to your technician.

Are they Right for Me?

That last question is one that no one can answer but you. The fact is that millions of women have adopted lash extensions as an essential component of their beauty enhancement ritual. Many of them swear by their perfect lashes and couldn’t imagine going back to their previous dull and uninspired natural lash look. In the end, though, this is about you. Do you want longer, thicker, more perfectly-curled lashes – without mascara tricks or other techniques? If so, then extensions may very well be your best option too.

When you do decide to rely on lash extensions, make sure that you only choose the best lash extensions in New York City. The lash experts at Ebenezer Eyelash have the extensions you need to finally enjoy those perfect lashes you deserve. Give us a call today and we’ll be happy to answer your questions and schedule your perfect lash appointment at your convenience
